text: James Gavin may refer to: *James M. Gavin (1907–1990), general in the United States Army and ambassador to France *Jim Gavin (footballer) (born 1971), Dublin GAA *James Gavin (covenanter), tailor who had his ears cut off and was enslaved for refusing to renounce his faith ==See also== *Gavin James (disambiguation) *James Galvin (disambiguation)
title: James Gavin
